1.2.1: Fixed missing scope for ListFiles component.
1.3.0: Added support for filtering files in ListFiles component.
Added standard outport types for ListFiles component: item, items, file.
1.3.1: Fixed NewFile component detection of new files.
1.3.2: Fixed searching files in ListFiles component when using Custom search query.
1.4.0: Fixed returning metadata in the GetFile component.
Added new component DownloadFile to retrieve the content of the file.
